Developing-Data-Products-Project
================================

This is the repository where Developing Data Products Project assignment is located:
The shiny application developed is a converter from KW to BHP.
It is very simple to use, just insert the KW value and click submit. The answer will be shown in BHP. 
The files of the application are:
* ui.R
* server.R

The application is accesible in: https://mandypar.shinyapps.io/DDP_Project

After a presentation of the application has been created using slidify. The presentation can be seen here:

http://rpubs.com/Mandypar/110943
